FAVORITES
ACCOUNT
Name:
{!accountEditMode ? 'Name' : nameInput}
Second Name:
{!accountEditMode ? 'Second Name' : secondNameInput}
{ setAccountEditMode(!accountEditMode); }} > {!accountEditMode ? 'EDIT' : 'SAVE'}
) }
